name: Trouble in Pizza Town
description:
Pizza has been made illegal and you owe a debt to the Pizza boss. Deliver pizzas quickly before you go deeper and deeper into debt.


PIZZA TOWN is the most DANGEROUS place for pizza delivery!

Can you pay your debt to the PIZZA BOSS before it gets DEEPER AND DEEPER INTO INFINITY? 

You have to deliver pizzas in order to SURVIVE. There's no ESCAPE!

It's time to adventure yourself in Trouble in Pizza Town!

Have fun playing! 

Game developed by: 

Jorge Blanco - Programmer and Game Designer 

Emily - Artist and Best Girl 

Dudas Beat - Music Composer

 Caio Varalta - Audio Designer / Sound Effects 

Raul Galhego - Technical Audio Designer / FMOD Implementation
